Visualising semigroups and elements
There are two operations and in &Semigroups; for creating &LaTeX; and dot (also known as GraphViz) format pictures of the Green's class structure of a semigroup and for visualising certain types of elements of a semigroup. There is also a function for automatically processing the output of and and opening the resulting pdf file.
